name: bumper (itch)
description:
A rhythm game made for #scorejam (https://itch.io/jam/scorejam-8bti-arcade-controls) in 72 hours.

How to play:

Notes move in from the outside to the center of the screen from 4 lanes.

Hold directional input (WASD, Arrow-Keys, Joystick) to select a lane.

Press CTRL, Space, or Joystick-Button-A to hit the note in the selected lane, when it reaches the bumper in the middle. Timing is key here.

Each succesfully hit note earns you points.

Best played with gamepad.

The complete song of the game: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1ZLriI6nuGpgASimizLXAOB6MHBuXdI_H
